name: Murdaware
description:
In Murdaware, you are about to witness a crime in a crowd...

But thanks to your powers, you can pause the time at the correct moment to prevent it !
Just be sure that you have proof the murderer is guilty otherwise you will loose. Also be sure to be fast enough otherwise the murderer will commit the crime !

How to play:

There is only one button which is SPACEBAR to pause the time.

Hard to see who is the murderer when he's in a crowd... What's your highest score ?

Context: Game created for the MiniJam #60
Engine used: Unity
Programmers: @Kahlan, @TheGamedevOwl
Time needed: Around 35h
